summary: I OWN PONTIAC G6 2006,AND I HAVE BEEN HAVING POWER STEERING PROBLEMS!!MY STEERING WHEEL COMPLETELY BLOCKS AFTER FEW ATTEMPTS TO PARK, I TOOK THE CAR TO THE DEALERSHIP TWICE THEY KEEP TELLING ME THAT S NORMAL!!I HAVE TO RESTART THE ENGINE TO BE ABLE TO MOVE!!!I M SCARED THAT SOMETHING MIGHT HAPPEN WHILE DRIVING!THEY CANT FIX THE CAR BECAUSE "EVERYTHING IS NORMAL". I CALLED GM AND SEE THAT I M NOT THE ONLY PERSON HAS  POWER STEERING PROBLEMS!!  THANK YOU  *TR
